entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
Number of whole days missed from school due to sickness or injury.
The reason for missing school, specifically due to being sick or injured.
Number of days missed due to staying home with a sick child or family member.
The frequency of unweighted responses in the survey.
The average value of the data collected for a specific variable.
The minimum value of the data collected for a specific variable.
The maximum value of the data collected for a specific variable.
The standard deviation value of the data collected for a specific variable.
A specific record group labeled as '-5' in the data.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent missed school due to sickness or injury.
Defines the reason for the school absence, such as being sick or injured.
Indicates the number of days the respondent missed school due to caring for a sick child or family member.
Describes the frequency of unweighted responses within the survey data.
Indicates the average value of the responses for a data variable.
Indicates the minimum value of responses for a data variable.
Indicates the maximum value of responses for a data variable.
Indicates the standard deviation of responses for a data variable.
Indicates the inclusion of a NA Window Group B record labeled as '-5' in the data.
